snippet: After failed attempts with three N.F.L. teams and three years away from the league, Danny Lansanah has been trying to chase his football dream and play for the Jets.
abstract: Profile of Danny Lansanah, linebacker vying for a spot on the New York Jets; Lansanah counsels teenagers at Alternative Rehabilitation Communities in his hometown of Harrisburg, Pa, urging them to follow their dreams no matter how much adversity they encounter.
lead_paragraph: After failed attempts with three N.F.L. teams and three years away from the league, Danny Lansanah has been trying to chase his football dream and play for the Jets.

headline.main: Life Advice for Youth Resurfaces for a Jet
headline.print_headline: Life Advice For Youth Resurfaces For a Jet
